long_description: Expand your travel options with the Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Tote Daypack. This tote converts easily to a daypack when you need your hands free, and in either mode it unzips to add 30% volume. This innovative, ultralight bag is made from highly durable and water-resistant silnylon (nylon impregnated with silicone). Bottom section unzips to expand tote/daypack from 19.5L to 26L. Adjustable mesh backpack straps wick moisture for a comfortable carry. Color-coded webbing loops and clips make it easy to connect the pack straps. Main compartment has finger-friendly zipper pulls that can take a lock (sold separately). 2 stretch-mesh side pockets can hold a water bottle, travel umbrella or other items. Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Tote Daypack has reflective accents for low-light visibility. Included carry/storage pouch can double as an internal security pocket. Dimensions of the bag when not expanded: 14 x 12.5 x 4.75 in. Washable.
short_description: Expand your travel options with the Eagle Creek 2-in-1 Tote Daypack. This tote converts easily to a daypack when you need your hands free, and in either mode it unzips to add 30% volume.
